=== 0.0.3 / 2008-02-26

* 2 Minor Enhancement:
  * Now raises exception when there are too many markers.
  * Now raises exception when the url becomes too long.

=== 0.0.2 / 2008-02-25

* 1 Major Enhancement:
  * Now supports Markers!
* 1 Minor Enhancement:
  * Removed StaticGmaps::Map.to_blob

=== 0.0.1 / 2008-02-25

* 1 major enhancement
  * Birthday!
